battle_skill_config-210770101: Attack mode can be switched in battle by pressing the skill button. Fever Mode (default): Burst mode. Deal 3 hits for 40% damage each and increase heat by 1 per attack. Favorite Drink: When buffed by a Big Beer, gain 0.5 point of shield HP per point of armor.
Normal attack: Launch an exploding rocket punch that deals 1.8x damage to a single target with a 10% knockback chance (does not stack with slug ammo).
battle_skill_config-271030101:
Press to toggle between Nano-Camo and MIRD-113.
MIRD-113: When activated, increase self damage by 50% and decrease the accuracy of all allies in the same column by 60% but increase their evasion by 50% (cannot activate Python's passive).
Nano-Camo: When activated, increase self evasion by 50% and decrease the evasion of all allies in same column by 60% but increase their accuracy by 50% (cannot activate Python's passive) .
When Dorothy is in the center row, she activates Nano-Camo by default and MIRD-113 otherwise.
Favorite Drink: When buffed by a Piano Woman, reduce the debuff effect of her skill by 50%.

battle_skill_config-271040101:
Grant ally SGs, SMGs, HGs, and Fairies a shield with a base HP of 14 points for 3 seconds. The shield gains additional HP based upon the target's missing HP, with the minimum increase being 0.8x and the maximum being 1.8x.
When Stella is present, Sei's attacks count toward Stella's passive skill.
Favorite Drink: When buffed by a Moonblast, skill takes effect for the duration of the Moonblast, and the additional shield HP gain based upon the target's missing HP is doubled.

Active: Fire a special grenade to apply 3 stacks of erosion to enemies within a radius of 2.5 and apply 2 extra stacks to the main target. Furthermore, normal attacks apply erosion at 100% chance for 3 seconds.
Passive: Normal attacks have a 20% chance to apply 1 stack of erosion. When an enemy reaches 5 stacks, deal 3x damage and 1.5 second stun within an extremely small area around that enemy and remove all stacks.
Erosion effect: Decrease the target's rate of fire and movement speed by 3% for 3 seconds.

battle_skill_config-280300301:
Upon Damage Focus N's activation, if the enemy with the highest HP is an armored unit, launch missiles to deal 0.6x damage against the target and 0.2x damage (affected by armor) to enemies within a radius of 2.
If the enemy with the highest HP is not an armored unit, throw a cluster grenade to deal 0.2x damage 7 times to enemies within a radius of 1 yard. Enemies hit more than once will receive 50% reduced damage (can be evaded, affected by armor).While the skill is active, normal attacks will pierce enemies with 1x damage. If there are enemies directly in front of her, switch to energy blade mode to deal 1x damage to those enemies.

Active: Begin charging after skill cooldown ends, gaining 1 charge stack every 1s, up to a maximum of 4 stacks. When skill is activated, aim for 1s, then deal 1.8-3x DMG to the enemy with the highest HP based on the current number of charge stacks. Additionally, deal 0.8x explosive dmg to enemies within a radius of 1.5 units. All stacks will be consumed on skill use.
 Passive: After attacking the same target 2 times, deal 0.8x bonus explosive dmg to enemies within a small radius on the next attack.

battle_skill_config-211350101:
Raise self ROF to the maximum and increase self damage by 25%. Click again to deactivate the skill.
 When skill is active, each attack adds 1 stacks of Overload. At 12 stacks of Overload, remove all stacks of Overload, stun self for 2 seconds and end the skill. While stunned, the echelon cannot move forward. 
 When the skill is deactivated, each attack removes 1 stacks of Overload.

battle_skill_config-290028701:
Passive: 
Gain 3 Pigeonwings upon the start of the battle. When an allied unit has received a stat-decreasing debuff, that unit gains 3% Rate of Fire for 4 seconds, stacking up to 1 time. This boost does not trigger other passive effects, and cannot take effect on the same unit within 3 seconds. When C-93 receives 1 stat-decreasing debuff, trigger the aforementioned effect on herself and gain 1 Pigeonwing. Only up to 6 Pigeonwings can be stocked at once.
Active:
Increase all allied units' damage by 8% for 3 seconds, and expend all currently stocked Pigeonwings. For every Pigeonwing expended, an ally gains 3% Rate of Fire for 4 seconds, stacking up to 2 times, and this can stack with the Passive variant. This skill prioritizes units that have not been buffed by the Pigeonwings, and thereafter the units with the highest damage. Once the skill ends, C-93 replenishes 3 Pigeonwings.

battle_skill_config-290041801:
Passive: Attacks have a 15% chance to cause Rage, which lasts for 3 seconds. While Rage is active, every normal attack deals an instance of 40% extra damage.
 Active: Activates Eye of the White Mastiff and monitors all enemies. Attacks on monitored enemies raise self firepower, accuracy and critical chance by 20%, and being attacked by a monitored enemy raises self evade by 20%. Monitoring lasts for 6 seconds. While the skill is in effect, gain 5 stacks of Strain every 2 seconds, with each group of monitored enemies adding 1 stack of Strain per 2 seconds. At 18 stacks of Strain, Eye of the White Mastiff drops in effectiveness and clears all Strain stacks, inflicting a 20% decrease in ROF and accuracy for 5 seconds. This debuff can coexist with Monitoring, but the skill cannot be reactivated while the debuff is in effect.

battle_skill_config-290129801:
Revision Mode: Each attack increases Focus by 1 points, with a maximum of 18 points. Automatically switches to Full Marks Mode once 18 points of Focus have been accumulated. When skill is activated in Revision Mode, expend 6 points of Focus to raise self damage by 15% and ROF by 15%, lasting for 4 seconds. If there are less than 6 points of Focus, all current points of Focus are expended.
Full Marks Mode: Each attack depletes 1 points of Focus, and when 18 points of Focus have been expended, automatically switch to Revision Mode. Attacks in Full Marks Mode target the unit with the highest HP, and consecutive attacks against the same target increase damage by 5% each, to a maximum of 3 stacks. When skill is activated in this mode, increase self damage by 15%, ROF by 30%, and accuracy by 30%, while also increasing damage taken by 30% and reducing move speed by 30%. This lasts for 6 seconds.

battle_skill_config-260030201:
Press skill to switch between different attack modes. Switching modes raises self move speed by 100% for 3 seconds.
<color=#db3d3d>Misty Rose</color>(default): Deal 1x damage to the closest target, and apply 5% vulnerability every 3 attacks.
 <color=#91c1f0>Clear Sky Empress</color>: Switch to melee attack mode and decrease attack range by 3. Attacks automatically inflict critical hits and ROF decreases by 40% while dealing 0.6x <color=#91c1f0>melee damage</color> to all enemies within a radius of 4.
 The first time you switch between modes, raise all melee units' movement speed by 50% and grant all melee units in front of Executioner a 5-point shield that lasts for 5 seconds.

Clicking the skill icon toggles between modes.
 Every 0.2 seconds, convert self evasion stat points into damage and accuracy. Every 1 points of evasion lost becomes 2 points of damage and 1 points of accuracy. This conversion stops when evasion falls below 85.
 Every 0.2 seconds, convert self damage and accuracy into evasion. Every 1 points of damage and 1 points of accuracy lost become 4 points of evasion. This conversion stops when damage falls below 50 points or accuracy falls below 35 points. 
 Stat changes are calculated after other buffs or debuffs are factored in. Converted stat points will not be lost because a buff or debuff is gone. After switching modes, priority will be given to restoring converted stat points.

The attack also induces a debuff to targets within a 4-unit radius, decreasing their firepower by 7.5% and rate of fire by 22%, while giving them 7.5% vulnerability, lasting for 4 seconds. The skill then activates a shield with taunt effect and an independent health bar that is 3% of Judge's maximum HP, lasting for 3.5 seconds. All damage dealt to the shield will be fixed at 1.

battle_skill_config-290214201:
Every time a unit reloads on the battlefield, M1897 gains a flechette round.
 If flechette rounds are available, they are expended before normal rounds. Every flechette round inflicts 1 attacks, dealing 20 instances of 0.6x damage that does not cause knockback. The multiple instances of damage are randomly assigned to enemies within attack range. The damage dealt to the same enemy unit is reduced by 30% with each instance, but without dropping below 10% of the original damage.

battle_skill_config-290214801: Skill 1 now applies marks to units that it damages. If any marked units remain on the battlefield, her remaining Dummies will launch grenades in sequence at the marked units, dealing 1.2x damage in a 2.5-unit radius around the target. (With the ""PT-3 Stock"" equipped, a check will be made every 6 seconds. If PP-19 has the highest HP on her row, her damage is increased by 10%, otherwise her evasion is increased by 10%. These effects last for 15 seconds and can stack).

battle_skill_config-290229401:
Passive: Gain 1 Hummingbird every 2 seconds. If there are no other friendly units on the same row at the start of battle, immediately gain 3 Hummingbirds. Only a maximum of 9 Hummingbirds can exist at a time. For every Hummingbird this unit possesses, self attacks inflict an additional 1x damage.
Active: Consume all Hummingbirds to buff the entire echelon. If 1/2/3 Hummingbirds are consumed, the entire echelon gains 5%/10%/15% increased damage. If 4/5/6 Hummingbirds are consumed, the entire echelon gains 3%/5%/15% increased rate of fire on top of that. If 7/8/9 Hummingbirds are consumed, the entire echelon gains 10%/25%/50% increased critical chance in addition to the other effects. These buffs last for 5 seconds and no additional Hummingbirds can be gained while the buffs are active.
battle_skill_config-390229401: Cooldown time: 15 seconds,Damage increase: 5%/10%/15%,Rate of fire increase: 3%/5%/15%,Critical chance increase: 10%/25%/50%,Duration: 5 seconds

battle_skill_config-290229901: Passive: Regular attacks fire 2 shots that deal two instances of 0.5x damage. If two shots hit simultaneously, they deal an additional amount of damage equal to 3% of the target's lost health (this cannot exceed 5x of own damage stat). Active: Increase the damage of 2 shots by 0.7x, while also increasing the additional damage to 6% of lost health (this cannot exceed 5x of own damage stat). While the skill is in effect, attacks against targets with less than 50% HP cannot miss. Skill duration: 3 seconds.

battle_skill_config-290230401:
Passive: At the start of the battle, randomly select an enemy unit as ""prey"". Killing the prey increases self damage by 30% and accuracy by 4% for the duration of the battle. When the prey is killed, another living enemy unit is chosen as prey.
 Active: Activate Hunting Time and immediately redesignate the enemy unit with the highest HP as the prey. Attacks focus on that unit until it dies. While this skill is in effect, every attack increases self damage by 6%, stacking up to 5 times. Hunting Time lasts for 3 seconds or until the current prey is killed.
battle_skill_config-390230401: Cooldown time: 10 seconds,Damage increase: 30%,Accuracy increase: 4 points,Hunting Time damage increase: 6%,Hunting Time duration: 3 seconds

battle_skill_config-290231201:
Passive: Damage dealt to enemy units also inflicts 1% vulnerability for 5 seconds, stacking up to 5 times. After 6 seconds, the amount of vulnerability inflicted is doubled.
 Active: Clicking the skill icon toggles between different attack modes. Sweep Mode (default): Attack two enemies at once and deal 0.5x damage to them. Prioritize enemies which have not been attacked yet. Stable Mode: Deal 2 instances of 0.5x damage to the same enemy and the first instance is a guaranteed hit.

Passive: Damage dealt by Adeline is evenly distributed among each of her target's Dummies. If an enemy has a Black Mark and a White Mark on them, Adeline's attack detonates them, removing them and dealing 1x guaranteed <color=#db3d3d>explosive damage</color> that ignores armor.
Active: For 4 seconds, Black Marks on the enemy will not be removed by detonation and all enemy units have their accuracy and evasion reduced by 10%. While this skill is in effect, prioritize enemy units with no Dummies. After 1 seconds of aiming, deal 1.6x guaranteed damage that is reduced by armor and can score critical hits.

When the debuff expires, all enemy units gain a shield with HP that equals 10% of a Dummy-Link's health, lasting for 5 seconds. If the next battle takes place on a non-friendly-controlled node, grant all friendly units a shield with HP that equals 30% of a Dummy-Link's health, lasting for 12 seconds. battle_skill_config-290339101: Gain 1 points of shield per normal attack. The value of this shield cannot exceed the amount of lost HP. This is recalculated with each new wave.
battle_skill_config-290339201: Every normal attack and skill has a 30% chance of inflicting a critical hit, dealing 1.5x critical damage.
battle_skill_config-290339301: Turn a 5-square wide stretch of ground outside friendly movement range into a burning zone which ignites units that step onto it, dealing 20% damage every 1 seconds.
battle_skill_config-290339401: After 5 successful normal attacks, generate a charge which is automatically consumed to perform a hacking attack. Hacking: deal 100% of self damage to the target.
battle_skill_config-290339501: Gain a support unit to help in battle, with 10% of the summoner's max HP and 50% of current damage/rate of fire. If this unit is killed, it can be re-summoned onto the battlefield.
battle_skill_config-290339601: Every 10 seconds, generate a Sensor Beacon randomly within friendly movement range. Moving to the area in question and obtaining the beacon instantly activates a skill and grants a 100% damage increase for 5 seconds.
battle_skill_config-290343501: Shields gained through normal attacks gain an additional 1 points of strength.
battle_skill_config-290343601: Normal attacks deal additional fixed damage equal to 1x of the current shield value.
battle_skill_config-290343701: When not taking damage, increase self damage by 50%. Every point of HP lost increases this effect by 1%.
battle_skill_config-290343801: The enhanced skill lasts 5 seconds longer.
battle_skill_config-290343901: When shield value is greater than HP, self damage is increased by 1.5%.
battle_skill_config-290344001: Shields gained through normal attacks gain an additional 2 points of strength.
battle_skill_config-290344101: Normal attacks deal additional fixed damage equal to 2x of the current shield value.
battle_skill_config-290344201: Immune to one instance of death and gain a shield equal to max HP.
battle_skill_config-290344301: While the enhanced skill is in effect, increase critical damage by an additional 150%.
battle_skill_config-290344401: Self critical chance permanently increased by 20%.
battle_skill_config-290344501: When a critical hit is inflicted, permanently increase damage by 40%.
battle_skill_config-290344601: If a grenade skill inflicts a critical hit, increase self damage by 100% for 3 seconds, stacking up to 1 times.
battle_skill_config-290344701: When the enhanced skill is in effect, increase critical chance by an additional 60%.
battle_skill_config-290344801: When critical chance exceeds 100%, the excess is converted to critical damage. Up to 200 points can be converted.
battle_skill_config-290344901: Self critical chance permanently increased by 50%.
battle_skill_config-290345001: When a critical hit is inflicted, permanently increase damage by 100%.
battle_skill_config-290345101: Grenade skills are changed to concentrate damage on single targets. Affected skills inflict 2x damage compared to before the change.
battle_skill_config-290345201: After every 5 regular attacks, fire an extra shot that does 5x critical damage.
battle_skill_config-290345301: Permanently increase self critical chance by 0.5% after every regular attack.
battle_skill_config-290345401: Damage inflicted by burning zones is permanently increased by 2.
battle_skill_config-290345501: Damage inflicted by burning zones is permanently increased by 8%.
battle_skill_config-290345601: For every 30 seconds, the multiplier for damage inflicted by burning zones permanently increases by 1%.
battle_skill_config-290345701: Damage inflicted by burning zones is permanently increased by 8%.
battle_skill_config-290345801: All burning units also suffer 15% vulnerability.
battle_skill_config-290345901: Grenade skills gain an ""Incendiary Grenade"" effect. After 3 seconds, an instance of burning damage is applied to all enemies within the radius of the grenade skill every 0.5 seconds.
battle_skill_config-290346001: Grenade skills gain an ""Incendiary Grenade"" effect. After 3 seconds, an instance of burning damage is applied to all enemies within the radius of the grenade skill every 0.5 seconds.
battle_skill_config-290346101: Regular attacks have a 6% chance to knock the enemy back.
battle_skill_config-290346201: The enemy suffers a 6% decrease in move speed every time they take damage from a burning zone or an incendiary grenade, stacking up to 10 times.
battle_skill_config-290346301: The enemy suffers 3% vulnerability every time they take damage from a burning zone or an incendiary grenade, stacking up to 8 times.
battle_skill_config-290346401: Grenade skills have a 100% chance to inflict a knockback of 1 on enemies within their area of effect.
battle_skill_config-290346501: Regular attacks have a 15% chance to knock the enemy back.
battle_skill_config-290346601: Move speed of all burning units is decreased by 40%.
battle_skill_config-290346701: Damage inflicted by burning zones is permanently increased by 20%.
battle_skill_config-290346801: All burning units also suffer 40% vulnerability.
battle_skill_config-290346901: Units which take burning damage for the first time suffer 100% vulnerability and have their move speed decreased by 90% for 3 seconds. This can only occur once to any unit.
battle_skill_config-290347001: Grenade skills gain an ""Incendiary Grenade"" effect. After 6 seconds, an instance of burning damage is applied to all enemies within the radius of the grenade skill every 0.5 seconds.
battle_skill_config-290347101: Enemies which take damage from incendiary grenades or burning zones gain 10% vulnerability, stacking infinitely.
battle_skill_config-290347201: Burning zones (but not incendiary grenades) deal their damage 1x more frequently.
battle_skill_config-290347301: This skill is changed to knock all enemies back a distance of 1 while also decreasing their move speed by 50% for 3 seconds.
battle_skill_config-290347401: Hacking inflicts an additional fixed damage of 15 points.
battle_skill_config-290347501: Hacking inflicts additional fixed damage equal to 40% of lost HP.
battle_skill_config-290347601: Hacking inflicts additional fixed damage equal to 2% of the target's max HP.
battle_skill_config-290347701: The number of attacks needed to initiate a hack is reduced by 1.
battle_skill_config-290347801: The damage of hacked targets is permanently decreased by 50%.
battle_skill_config-290347901: The rate of fire of hacked targets is permanently decreased by 50%.
battle_skill_config-290348001: The move speed of hacked targets is permanently decreased by 40%.
battle_skill_config-290348101: Base hacking damage is permanently increased by 50%.
battle_skill_config-290348201: For every 30 seconds that pass, the portion of base hacking damage derived from this unit's damage stat is permanently increased by 8%.
battle_skill_config-290348301: Each enemy death immediately triggers a hacking attack.
battle_skill_config-290348401: Each hacking attack decreases the target's damage by 20%, stacking up to 4 times.
battle_skill_config-290348501: Each hacking attack decreases the target's rate of fire by 20%, stacking up to 4 times.
battle_skill_config-290348601: Hacking inflicts additional fixed damage equal to 5% of the target's max HP.
battle_skill_config-290348701: The number of attacks needed to initiate a hack is reduced by 2.
battle_skill_config-290348801: Hacking attacks charged by normal attacks are now changed to affect all enemy units. The additional damage and debuffs remain the same, but the hacking attack only does 20% of the base damage.
battle_skill_config-290348901: Units hacked for the first time suffer 90% reduced damage/move speed for 5 seconds.
battle_skill_config-290349001: Hacking now inflicts AoE damage in a radius of 5-unit.
battle_skill_config-290349101: After charging a hacking attack with normal attacks, gain two additional hacking attacks.
battle_skill_config-290349201: If a hacking attack does not kill an enemy, immediately gain an additional hacking attack. This can only be triggered by the same enemy unit once every 5 seconds.
battle_skill_config-290349301: Automatically hack an enemy unit based on self rate of fire (currently, one automatic hack is gained per two normal attacks).
battle_skill_config-290349401: Hacking attacks automatically kill enemies with less than 15% of max HP.
battle_skill_config-290349501: Friendly reinforcement units gain 5% permanently increased HP.
battle_skill_config-290349601: Friendly reinforcements gain 25% permanently increased damage.
battle_skill_config-290349701: Friendly reinforcements gain 25% permanently increased rate of fire.
battle_skill_config-290349801: Friendly reinforcements have their HP permanently reduced by 5% but gain 20% permanently increased damage/rate of fire.
battle_skill_config-290349901: Whenever a reinforcement unit leaves the battlefield, self damage increases by 80% for 3 seconds. Does not stack.
battle_skill_config-290350001: Whenever a reinforcement unit leaves the battlefield, self rate of fire increases by 80% for 3 seconds. Does not stack.
battle_skill_config-290350101: Whenever a reinforcement unit leaves the battlefield, the next reinforcement unit to arrive has their damage/rate of fire permanently increased by 3%.
battle_skill_config-290350201: Whenever a reinforcement unit leaves the battlefield, the next reinforcement unit to arrive has their HP permanently increased by 1%.
battle_skill_config-290350301: Reinforcements gain the skill ""Last Word"": When they are removed from the battlefield, they will immediately trigger an enhancement or grenade skill.
battle_skill_config-290350401: Reinforcements gain the skill ""Legion"": Every 8 seconds, all friendly units gain 25% increased damage and a 5-point shield for 5 seconds.
battle_skill_config-290350501: Reinforcements gain the skill ""Growth"": Every 8 seconds, the damage of the reinforcements is permanently increased by 30%, stacking up to 5 times. They also gain a shield with a value equal to the amount of lost HP.
battle_skill_config-290350601: Reinforcements gain the skill ""Comrades"": For every friendly reinforcement unit that dies, this unit gains 100% increased damage/rate of fire for 5 seconds.
battle_skill_config-290350701: Number of reinforcements increases by 2, but their rate of fire/damage is permanently reduced by 50%.
battle_skill_config-290350801: Number of reinforcements increases by 2, but subsequent reinforcements have their inherited HP permanently reduced to 5% and their inherited damage/rate of fire reduced to 30%.
battle_skill_config-290351101: Gain an elite reinforcement unit, Savage 99. Her inherited damage is 2x of normal. Skill: Sniping - 5x damage. Cooldown: 6 seconds.
battle_skill_config-290351301: Gain an elite reinforcement unit, VP1915. Her inherited HP is 2x of normal. Skill: Forcefield - immune to all damage for 2 seconds. Cooldown: 8 seconds.

When a target has a total of 15 marks, remove all enemies' shields, evasion buffs and armor buffs, while also reducing the target's evasion and armor by 32% for 5 seconds. An enemy can only be affected once by the debuff.
Active: Increase all friendly units' critical chance by 7%. 1.5% vulnerability is also applied to the target for each mark present on the battlefield, lasting 3.2 seconds.

battle_skill_config-290242501:
Passive: SGs on this unit's buff tiles gain a formation buff - whenever any units take damage, a teddy bear plushie appears in front of them and attracts enemy targeting. This effect can only trigger once every 15 seconds. The bear has 5% of this unit's max HP, 50% of her evasion and armor and lasts 5 seconds. 
Active: Click the skill icon to toggle between different attack modes. Continuous Mode (default): reduce self damage and accuracy by 30% and increase the interval between attacks by 50%. Reloading is not needed in this mode.
Burst Mode: Increase critical chance and critical damage by 20% and prioritize the enemy unit with the highest HP. After every 3 shots, the next shot does double damage.

battle_skill_config-290243101:
Passive: Damage dealt by Alina is evenly distributed among the target's Dummy-Links. When an enemy unit has a Black Mark and a White Mark on them at the same time and Alina is on the battlefield, she detonates the marks (clearing them both) and deals 1x guaranteed <color=#db3d3d>explosive damage</color> that ignores armor.
Active: For the next 9 seconds, her normal attack is enhanced into a three-part attack, the first two of which inflict <color=#91c1f0>melee damage</color> to a single unit, while the third part deals <color=#91c1f0>melee damage</color> in a radius of 3, while also triggering Rest In Peace. Every attack applies a permanent White Mark to the target. The damage multipliers for each part of her attack are 1x, 2x and 0.8x.
battle_skill_config-390243101: Explosion multiplier: 1x,Duration: 9 seconds,Part 1 damage multiplier: 1x,Part 2 damage multiplier: 2x,Part 3 damage multiplier: 0.8x

battle_skill_config-211640101:
Active: Jashin-chan Dropkick! Jashin-chan executes a powerful dropkick against the enemy unit with the highest HP, gaining 1.5s of invincibility while dealing 2x damage to enemies in the epicenter (within a 1.5-unit radius). The dropkick also deals damage to enemies on the outer ring (within a 4-unit radius), ranging from a minimum of 0.6x to a maximum of 1.8x damage. The more enemies there are in the epicenter, the higher the damage.
 Passive: Jashin-chan uses her dropkick as normal attacks and deals AoE damage to the nearest enemy unit in a 1-unit radius. These attacks are affected by the target's evasion and armor and scale with Dummy-Links. Jashin-chan generates a shield whose value equals 10% of her lost HP every 10s.
battle_skill_config-311640101: Cooldown time: 15 seconds,Epicenter multiplier: 2x,Outer ring maximum damage multiplier: 1.8x,Outer ring minimum damage multiplier: 0.6x
